name: LyntonWeb
tag_list: web-design, inbound-marketing, social-media, web-marketing, internet-marketing, seo
overview:
Lynton Web LLC is a web solutions company, offering web development, inbound marketing, content management software, and HubSpot integration. Founded by Daniel Lynton in 1999, the company has grown to over 30 employees with headquarters in Houston, Texas.

In 2008, Lynton Web partnered with HubSpot, a marketing software startup, to help customers grow their business with inbound marketing. In addition to offering marketing services on HubSpot, Lynton Web has built free and paid apps on the popular platform, including CRM integration, custom lead scoring, e-commerce and live chat integration.

In 2012, Lynton Web partnered with Pervasive Software (NASDAQ: PVSW), maker of data management and integration software. The Pervasive Data Cloud powers many of its integration apps, including Microsoft Dynamics CRM, NetSuite, Zoho and Sugar CRM. The Data Cloud is licensed to ISVs and systems integrators for any third party integration with HubSpot.

Lynton Web’s clients range from small business to multinational Fortune 500. Clients enjoy a strong ROI from the company’s integration of modern web design with inbound marketing and software solutions.
